name: Distorted Reality
description: Distorted Reality is a first-person survival horror, which takes place in the hospital of Alexandria. For mysterious reasons, the usual laws of physics in the hospital completely stopped working.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel core i3 or amd fx4300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 or R7 260 Storage: 3 GB available space
